title: I Reincarnated As A Faint Hearted Countess
alternative_title: 転生先が気弱すぎる伯爵夫人だった ; 転生先が気弱すぎる伯爵夫人だった～前世最強魔女は快適生活を送りたい～ ; Tensei-saki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin datta ; Tenseisaki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin Datta - Zense Saikyou Majo wa Kaiteki Seikatsu wo Okuritai ; Tensei-saki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin datta: Zense Saikyou Majo wa Kaiteki Seikatsu wo Okuritai ; Reincarnated as an Overly Timid Countess ; Tenseisaki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin Datta
status: 転生先が気弱すぎる伯爵夫人だった ; 転生先が気弱すぎる伯爵夫人だった～前世最強魔女は快適生活を送りたい～ ; Tensei-saki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin datta ; Tenseisaki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin Datta - Zense Saikyou Majo wa Kaiteki Seikatsu wo Okuritai ; Tensei-saki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin datta: Zense Saikyou Majo wa Kaiteki Seikatsu wo Okuritai ; Reincarnated as an Overly Timid Countess ; Tenseisaki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin Datta
description:
Description :
        The cowardly Countess Ram, who is constantly lambasted by her maids, is having an ordeal at the place she was wed. She is supposed to be a newlywed, but her husband, the Count, didn’t even pay regard to her. Then one day, she hits her head on a wall and regains her memory of her previous life. Ram of the previous life was a great witch who was touted as the most powerful in the country. Fed up with her cramped life, she decides to live on her own terms, taking advantage of the memories she regained.

Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Fainthearted Countess Awakens
